mapper.select: SELECT brand.id, concat( c2.id, '-', c1.id, '-', brand.category_id ) AS category_ids, brand.`name`, brand.name_en FROM tb_brand brand INNER JOIN tb_category c ON brand.category_id = c.id INNER JOIN tb_category c1 ON c.parent_id = c1.id INNER JOIN tb_category c2 ON c1.parent_id = c2.id WHERE brand.id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND brand.is_deleted = 0
